title: Uchi no Obaa-chan ga Motoyan ni Nerawarete imasu!
description:
Jun's latest worry has been the mysterious man that has been frequenting her beloved grandma's small-time candy store. Not only is his body big, he has a sharp stare and he's cloaked in an aura that's enough to send your body temperature plummeting in an instant. Apparently, there's also rumors that he's a legendary delinquent. Could he planning to seize this store?!

...By the way, there's a particular air to the way he's turning his gaze towards my grandma...?!

matches.title: Oji-san ga Joshi●sei ni Warui Koto wo Oshieru Hanashi
Fuyu Fenrir no Itoshigo to Natta Watashi ga, Zetsubou kara Iyasareteiku Hanashi
